name: Road of Agony
description:
Road of Agony

This is my entry for the Nokia 3310 Jam 2022.

Road of Agony is a hardcore platformer inspired by Hollow Knight and Celeste.

Controls
  • Up, Down, Left and Right to move the character arround and navigate menus.
    • Arrow Keys, WASD, ZQSD or IJKL.
  • Dash/Accept
    • Space
  • Back to Level Selection and Exit Game
    • Escape (or Backspace in the Browser Version)
Difficulty

This game gets very difficult. I don't actually expect that anyone will play it all the way through.

To hopefully counteract frustration I took the following measures:

  • Level Unlocks
    • All Levels are unlocked from the start and can be selected at any time.
    • So if you get stuck or frustrated on a level, feel free to skip to the next one.
  • Assist Mode
    • At any point in the game you can toggle the following Assist Modes:
      • Slow Down - Press V to toggle between the game running at full- or half-speed.
      • Unlimited Jumps - Press C to give you unlimited jumps in the air.
      • Invincibility . Press X to make yourself impossible to kill.
Credits

Road of Agony was made in the Godot Engine 3.4.2.

Sprites were made using Aseprite.

Fonts were made by Somepx and are available at the Nokia 3310 Jam Resources Page.

Sounds were made by Trix and are also available at the Nokia 3310 Jam Resources Page.

Finally this game is Open Source and available here: https://github.com/TLochow/Road-of-Agony
